2.title: Yoo

paragraph.1: Iâ€™m Rochenette Legaspina, a UI/UX designer from the Philippines with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering. My design approach combines creativity with a focus on user-centered solutions.
paragraph.2: I started my career in the gaming industry, working as a 3D modeler, and later expanded to 3D texturing and re-topology while I was in college. A colleague introduced me to UI/UX design, which sparked my interest in creating user-friendly, creative designs.
paragraph.3: After graduating college, I gained real experience as a UI/UX designer at a software company. Seeking a broader understanding of the development process, I later worked as a Systems Analyst, collaborating closely with clients and team members. This role helped me bridge the gap between design and development, with the goal of creating designs that are both visually appealing and purpose-driven, solving real user problems.

scClaims.title: Senior Citizen Discount Claims System
scClaims.description: SC Claims is a web-based platform that streamlines senior citizen discount validation by allowing users to upload Excel records with SKU details. The system automatically validates these records based on pre-set criteria, ensuring accurate and quick reimbursements to pharmacies and hospitals. By automating this process, SC Claims reduces manual effort, saves time, and ensures a smooth, error-free reimbursement workflow.

iqmk.title: IQMK
iqmk.description: IQMK Global is an app that supports people in achieving their wellness and financial goals. It offers premium Muscadine grape products, including the flagship MusNatural, known for its health benefits. The app provides a low-risk business opportunity through direct sales, e-commerce, and a network marketing plan, helping users achieve health, financial freedom, and a better lifestyle.
